overview:
Founder and CEO at Immersive Labs, a company developing adaptive face detection technology.

Technologist and entrepreneur, previously founded Mind Spin Research (acquired by Troy Research), a radio research software used by radio stations nationwide. Expert generalist with experience developing HCI technologies previously building an 8ft computer vision based multi-touch display with Haworth R&D. Selected as a “40 Under 40” business leader, managed Fortune 500 client relationships and successfully executed large-scale projects. Research Fellow at Hybrid Reality Institute and Advisory Business Board Member at LifeBoat Foundation.
